dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, we've seen a lot of back and forth this week, right? With, like, both campaigns calling each other out on protest violence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, we've seen a lot of back and forth this week, right? With, like, both campaigns calling each other out on protest violence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since violent clashes between Black Lives Matter protesters and counter-protesters in Kenosha and Portland led to three deaths last week, the Biden and Trump campaigns have repeatedly called on each other to denounce protest violence while accusing each other of supporting it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. But what's really striking, to me anyway, is just how contradictory Trump's message has become.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. But what's really striking, to me anyway, is just how contradictory Trump's message has become.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He, um, he spent so much time, you know, criticizing Biden for not adequately denouncing violence...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He, um, he spent so much time, you know, criticizing Biden for not adequately denouncing violence...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After asserting that former Vice President Joe Biden failed to adequately denounce protest violence, President Donald Trump on Monday defended the violent actions of a caravan of his supporters in Portland, Ore., as well as those of Kyle Rittenhouse, a 17-year-old accused of murdering two protesters in Kenosha, Wisconsin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which, by the way, Biden *did* do. Pretty sternly, actually, saying rioting isn't protesting. He even, like, mentioned radical left-wing groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, by the way, Biden did do. Pretty sternly, actually, saying rioting isn't protesting. He even, like, mentioned radical left-wing groups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bidens remarks were met with immediate dissatisfaction from the Trump team, with Trump campaign advisor Jason Miller hitting Biden for not specifically mentioning radical left-wing groups like Antifa in his blanket denunciation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And, uh, Trump's team initially praised him for that, actually. Jason Miller, I think? But then Trump just completely pivoted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And, uh, Trump's team initially praised him for that, actually. Jason Miller, I think? But then Trump just completely pivoted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bidens remarks were met with immediate dissatisfaction from the Trump team, with Trump campaign advisor Jason Miller hitting Biden for not specifically mentioning radical left-wing groups like Antifa in his blanket denunciation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's wild. Because then he turned around and, uh, praised *his own supporters* who were involved in violent actions. Like that caravan in Seattle?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's wild. Because then he turned around and, uh, praised his own supporters who were involved in violent actions. Like that caravan in Seattle?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest and declared paint is not bullets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the Seattle one where they were, like, shooting at counter-protesters with *real bullets*? And he called it a "peaceful protest"? And said "bullets are not paint"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the Seattle one where they were, like, shooting at counter-protesters with real bullets? And he called it a peaceful protest? And said bullets are not paint?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest and declared paint is not bullets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] I know, right? It's just... mind-boggling. And then there's Rittenhouse, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? It's just... mind-boggling. And then there's Rittenhouse, too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, Kyle Rittenhouse. The, um, the kid accused of murdering three people. Trump called that an "interesting situation" and even suggested he'd probably "be elected."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, Kyle Rittenhouse. The, um, the kid accused of murdering three people. Trump called that an interesting situation and even suggested he'd probably be elected.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kyle Rittenhouse, a 17-year-old accused of murdering two protesters in Kenosha, Wisconsin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. Meanwhile, Biden's out there saying, "Do I look like a radical socialist with a soft spot for rioters?" You know, trying to counter that narrative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. Meanwhile, Biden's out there saying, Do I look like a radical socialist with a soft spot for rioters? You know, trying to counter that narrative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ask yourself: Do I look to you like a radical socialist with a soft spot for rioters? Really? Biden asked during his speech, in contrast with Trumps claim that he would surrender to the left wing mob.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, also, kind of pushing back on the anti-police thing, saying every cop deserves to come home safe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, also, kind of pushing back on the anti-police thing, saying every cop deserves to come home safe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden also contradicted Trumps multiple assertions that he is anti-police, telling Pittsburgh CBS affiliate KDKA, every cop when he puts on that badge has the right to be able to come home at night and to be safe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a direct contradiction to, like, Trump's assertions about him. And the Biden campaign really hit back hard, calling Trump "too weak, too scared" to condemn his own people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a direct contradiction to, like, Trump's assertions about him. And the Biden campaign really hit back hard, calling Trump too weak, too scared to condemn his own people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Biden campaign released a statement calling Trump too weak, too scared, to repudiate one of his supporters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they said if he can't condemn violence from his own side, he's, uh, unfit to be president. Pretty strong words.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they said if he can't condemn violence from his own side, he's, uh, unfit to be president. Pretty strong words.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the statement, Biden urged Trump to join me in saying that while peaceful protest is a right a necessity violence is wrong, period. No matter who does it, no matter what political affiliation they have. Period, and said that, if he cant, he is unfit to be President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Super strong. And now, uh, Trump's heading to Milwaukee, right? Despite Governor Evers telling him not to.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super strong. And now, uh, Trump's heading to Milwaukee, right? Despite Governor Evers telling him not to.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Trump is slated to travel to Kenosha on Tuesday to survey the damage from the protests, despite Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers urging him not to.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he, uh, he thinks it'll "increase enthusiasm" and "love and respect for our country," even though, you know, there are concerns it could just increase violence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he, uh, he thinks it'll increase enthusiasm and love and respect for our country, even though, you know, there are concerns it could just increase violence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Should be very interesting, Trump said of the visit, predicting It could increase enthusiasm, it could increase love and respect for our country, after he was asked about concerns it could increase violence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Like, given everything else we've talked about, it just feels like, um, another layer of... well, something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Like, given everything else we've talked about, it just feels like, um, another layer of... well, something.
